column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We all ended up getting the dry-aged ribeye cooked at varying degrees. I ended up getting mine medium well. The steak was cooked to perfection. It was tender and flavorful. I added the seasoned salt on top and it pulled additional flavors from the steak as well. For sides we had the fries with garlic aoli (so addicting)
column3: creamed spinach and the truffle Mac and cheese topped with bacon. The truffle Mac was by far the best Mac N Cheese I've ever had and it was the highlight of my meal there. Definitely recommend it; you will not be disappointed!
